hints.content:
Grandpa started with $\goldE{79}$ pieces of food.

![A number line is labeled 79 on the right and extends to the left.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/83fbb9c12a1bfd9d204dcdde5fd28b485583c5c1)

To subtract on the number line, we jump to the **left**.

He fed $\maroonD{14}$ pieces of food to the ducklings.

![From the right at 79 with minus 14 goes to 65. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/7fb48ae7cb0b8a2342bcd0abfb5cebabcf2ad096)

$\goldE{79} - \maroonD{14} = 65$

Then he fed $\purpleD{17}$ pieces of food to the seagulls.

![From the right at 79 with minus 14 goes to 65. From 65 minus 17 goes to 48. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ef5c43c50a76a5296334614daba71b01b8298d0b)

$65 - \purpleD{17} =48$

Last, he fed $\blueE{32}$ pieces of food to the swans.

![A number line starts at 16 on the left and goes to 79 on the right. From the right at 79 with minus 14 goes to 65. From 65 minus 17 goes to 48. From 48 minus 32 goes to 16.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/7299e6bd99e71f98fc6fddb590083d079325d43b)

$48 - \blueE{32} = 16$

Here is the correct number line:

![A number line starts at ? on the left and goes to 79 on the right. From the right at 79 with minus 14 goes to 65. From 65 minus 17 goes to 48. From 48 minus 32 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/5b0e4e4fcd49a5420d46ad1e7f364f8e8f909488)

Grandpa had ${16}$ pieces of food left.

question.content:
Grandpa brought a bag with $79$ pieces of food to feed the birds at the pond.   

Grandpa fed $14$ pieces of food to ducklings, $17$ pieces to seagulls, and $32$ pieces to swans.   

**Which number line shows how to find how many pieces of food Grandpa has left?**

[[☃ radio 1]]  

**How many pieces of food does Grandpa have left?**

[[☃ numeric-input 1]] pieces of food

choices.content: ![A number line starts at ? on the left and goes to 97 on the right. From the right at 97 with minus 14 goes to 83. From 83 minus 17 goes to 66. From 66 minus 32 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/7af71456d6425acb1e5450a9a5b98a8a95976b20)

![A number line starts at ? on the left and goes to 79 on the right. From the right at 79 with minus 14 goes to 65. From 65 minus 17 goes to 48. From 48 minus 32 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/5b0e4e4fcd49a5420d46ad1e7f364f8e8f909488)
